txt.en:
'These towns we have seen, including this one, are more dense than those of my people. Perhaps that makes them easier to defend, but it also means a single burning brand from a foe might set the whole place ablaze.

'That may be worth remembering, if the horse-lords continue to treat my people with such scorn!

'Ah, that was a jest, my friend! Do not look at me like that.'
What do you think of Floodwend?
